title: Way too much lag
body: i hope I wont get reported for this .. it isn't fair

replies.body:
There's a number of things that could be causing lag in your games, so the first step would be to try the steps found in our [Troubleshooting Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you're still running into problems, could you provide more information about what you're experiencing? Are you having high ping, getting disconnected from games, stuttering, etc.  Knowing more about your problem helps us to solve it faster.
